definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: Please pop my letter into the nearest letter-box.
sentences.chinese: 请把我的信投入最近的信箱。

sentences.english: They knocked together two rough mailboxes with wooden boards.
sentences.chinese: 他们用木板草草地做成了两个粗糙的信箱。

sentences.english: We gave you a post-office box two months ago.
sentences.chinese: 我们两个月前给了您一个邮局的信箱。

sentences.english: Switch off your phone and allow messages to go to voicemail.
sentences.chinese: 将你手机关机，让信息转到语音信箱。

sentences.english: Letterbox Direct said it had followed all the correct procedures.
sentences.chinese: “直达信箱”表示它遵循了所有的正规程序。

sentences.english: The key which you posted was in the locked letter-box too.
sentences.chinese: 你邮寄的钥匙也在锁着的信箱里。

sentences.english: But this didn't work anymore. There was also a letterbox. But it was too small for letter.
sentences.chinese: 那儿还有个信箱，可是小得根本塞不进去信。

sentences.english: To participate in the discussion forums, users are required to disclose their name and email address.
sentences.chinese: 要参与论坛，用户需要明示其姓名和电子信箱地址。

sentences.english: If you do not have a PO Box, use your work address.
sentences.chinese: 如果你没有邮政信箱，使用你的工作地址。

sentences.english: I need to get a new email account.
sentences.chinese: 我需要申请一个新的电子信箱。

sentences.english: About a week later a letter appeared in my mailbox.
sentences.chinese: 大约一个星期之后我的信箱里来了封信。

sentences.english: A post office box number is not acceptable.
Please fill in following fields then click the submit button , we will send your replying form to your E-mail box .
sentences.chinese: 系统会将您的报名回函寄发到您的电子邮件信箱。

sentences.english: Don't forget to stick a stamp on an envelope before you put it into the mail-box.
sentences.chinese: 把信投进信箱前别忘了在信封上贴上邮票。

sentences.english: The bell rang again, and the next moment she heard her letter-box being pushed open.
sentences.chinese: 门铃又响了，接着她就听到自己的信箱被打开了。

definition: mail room/radio room (i.e. reception and transmission)
email/abbr. for 電子郵件|电子邮件[dian4 zi3 you2 jian4]
